name: cssi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0))))

stmt.origin: ibi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))), wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ c1, (c0 ∈ c1 ↔ c0 =(c2 `(c2 ` c0))), c3 ∈ dom(ClSubSp))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)))
-| wi(wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)))
-| wi(wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(c2 `(c2 ` c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c3 ∈ dom(ClSubSp))
⊣ (c3 ∈ dom(ClSubSp)→(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ c0 =(c2 `(c2 ` c0))))

stmt.origin: eleq2s(c0, c1, cfv(ccss, c3), wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccss, c3)), wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c3 ∈ dom(ClSubSp))
⊣ (c0 ∈(ClSubSp ` c3)→ c3 ∈ dom(ClSubSp))
⊣ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccss, c3)), wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(c2 `(c2 ` c0)))
⊣ (c3 ∈ dom(ClSubSp)→(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ c0 =(c2 `(c2 ` c0))))
⊣ (c0 ∈(ClSubSp ` c3)→ c3 ∈ dom(ClSubSp))
⊣ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c3, cdm(ccss)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0)))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cocv, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c3 ∈ dom(ClSubSp)→(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ c0 =(c2 `(c2 ` c0))))
⊣ c2 =(ocv ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cfv(c2, c0))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cocv, c3))

comment: Property of a closed subspace (of a pre-Hilbert space). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
